message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique item that will bring significant value to your business. My initial offer is $12000.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $12000 is above my budget. I'm willing to pay $8500 for the product. This is my best offer.
I understand that $8500 is a bit below my target, but I'm willing to negotiate. Considering your budget, I can offer you a slight discount. My counteroffer is $11000.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, but $11000 is still outside my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9000 for the product.  Let's try to find a solution that works for both of us.
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I can see you're willing to go up to $9000, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so my counteroffer is $10500.
